aise na ruth baato baato me wade na tod aisi raato me
dhanno tujhe khwaab me dekhaa hai
bol diya to, bolne do na, achchha
abhi jake bajar se bhagwa chunri le aana
sara jag jane tera mera pyar hai
gale se lagaalo ke tumhaara beqaraar hun main
mera pyaar woh hain
duniya teri yahi hai to duniya se mai chala
jan-e-man in hatho me to
dur hai wo nazdik nahi hai, ab ye milna thik nahi hai
ghat ghat ka pani pike humne sari umar guzari
haridwar mein ganga dekhi aur dilli mein jamuna
masum samajh ke dore mat daalo
prit kar ke kabhi pritam se na bichhade koyi
kahi bhi jaye re, roye ya gaye re
basti se dur, parbat ke pichhe
kyu hai na, nahi nahi
imli ke bute ho imli ke bute
aur bhi gusse me khile tu hasina
aankh jhukaake kuchh naa boli, dhire se muskaai
tu hi nazro me jaan-e-tamanna
inhe jan sakata nahi ye zamana
zara pahchano, mein hoon don
chhodo bahana na na na
aji lena ek waada hai, kya
yaha dukhde sahne ke vaste tujhko bulate
are masti bhari aankho se do jam chura laya
mai tulsi tere aangan ki, mai tulsi tere aangan ki
aai hai rang bhari shaam
tu danda lekar aayega main kue me gir jaaungi
dil jo na hota kuch bhi na hota, aankh na roti aur dard na uthta
chhoti-chhoti bato pe na bigada karo
meraa qusur kyaa hai
ye chirag bujh rahe hai mere saath jalte jalte
jabse dekha maine tujhko, mujhko shayari aa gai
baadal garje megh barse chahu or saavan laharaaye
aaj ki raat yeh kaisi raat ke hamko neend nahi aati
kis sawan me mile sajanwa, woh sawan kab aaye kab aaye
log kahe kyon pite ho, man kahta kyon jite ho
tu hai harajai to apna bhi yahi aur sahi
ek hai do badan, do badan ek hai
meri laaj rakho main ek nanha sa
mamataa ne mukh modaa
aaye toh pyasa dil divana ho jaye
are, kahe ki sharama ve mundaya, jaldi karana
in farishto ne
jabse hai janmi pyar ki duniya tujhko hai meri mujhe teri lagan
ham aur bandhenge, ham tum kuchh aur badhenge
